info.title: Dynamics NAV
info.description: Dynamics NAV is a business management solution for small and mid-sized organizations that automates and streamlines business processes and helps you manage your business. You can use this connector with Dynamics NAV 2017 or later.

get.description: Retrieves item metadata for DynamicsNavision object type.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of Dynamics NAV table

get.description: Retrieves all datasets available to the connection
Retrieves DynamicsNavision items of a certain DynamicsNavision type (example: 'Suggestion')

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of Dynamics NAV table

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of Dynamics NAV table

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row to insert into the specified table in Dynamics NAV

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution
